**Source** [Guns & Gears](/Sources.aspx?ID=98) pg. 127 <sup>2.0</sup>

_[**PFS Note**](/pathfinder-society) All Pathfinder Society agents have access to the Gunslinger archetype._

You like a weapon that makes an impression almost as much as you like making an impression.

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<title level="3">Multiclass Gunslinger Characters</title>

Gunslinger is a great fit for dexterous characters who want a weapon that hits hard from a distance, especially [rangers](/Classes.aspx?ID=9) and [rogues](/Classes.aspx?ID=10) who already have abilities that can make their first hit count. Spellcasters with [_true strike_](/Spells.aspx?ID=345) might favor firearms with the [fatal](/Traits.aspx?ID=178) property and gunslinger abilities that improve options for supporting their allies.
